did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle:
Professor Smith's Equine Medicine Class Notes,
1882
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Bound book of notes from an equine medicine class given by a "Professor Smith" at an unidentified college or veterinary program in 1882.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Bound book of notes from an equine medicine class given by a "Professor Smith" at an unidentified college or veterinary program in 1882. The class appears to have been about the diagnosis and treatment of diseases and injuries of horses.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: The notes are extremely brittle. Photocopying is prohibited.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Professor Smith's Equine Medicine Class Notes, #6575. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

custodhist.head: HISTORY OF OWNERSHIP
custodhist.p: Owned at one time by Henry Godwin. Later aquired by an antiques dealer, sold to another individual, then purchased by Dr. Michael A. Marks.

acqinfo.head: PROVENANCE
acqinfo.p: Donated to Cornell University by Dr. Michael A. Marks in January, 2003.
